content: Chapter 4 brings a conclusion to the run of secret Loong bosses, but is also packed with plenty of hidden bosses, including 3 in a secret area.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md", under the primary heading "Secret Bosses in Chapter 4". The content is presented below:

Chapter 4 brings a conclusion to the run of secret Loong bosses, but is also packed with plenty of hidden bosses, including 3 in a secret area.
